property: The base64 encoded string from Lavalink.
The duration of the track in milliseconds.
Whether the track can be seeked.

duration.name: duration
duration.short_desc: The duration of the track in milliseconds.

seekable.name: seekable
seekable.short_desc: Whether the track can be seeked.

track.name: track
track.short_desc: The base64 encoded string from Lavalink.

track.name: track
track.short_desc: The base64 encoded string from Lavalink.

url.name: url
url.short_desc: The URL to the track (if the track gets streamed).

seekable.name: seekable
seekable.short_desc: Whether the track can be seeked.

create.name: create
create.short_desc: Creates an Audio Track instance from an array.

AUDIO_END_REASON_CONTINUE.name: AUDIO_END_REASON_CONTINUE
AUDIO_END_REASON_CONTINUE.short_desc:
Indicates whether a new track should be started on receiving the `trackEnd` event. If this is false, either this event is
already triggered because another track started (REPLACED) or because the player is stopped (STOPPED, CLEANUP).

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Client.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\Client
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Client.short_desc: The generic Lavalink client. It does absolutely nothing for you on the Discord side.
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Client.long_desc:
The lavalink client implements automatic failover. That means, if a lavalink node unexpectedly disconnects,
the client will automatically look for a new node and starts playing the track on it.

property: A collection of nodes, mapped by name.
The amount of shards the bot has.

nodes.name: nodes
nodes.short_desc: A collection of nodes, mapped by name.

numShards.name: numShards
numShards.short_desc: The amount of shards the bot has.

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.long_desc:
Optional options are as following:
```
array(
    'connector' => \React\Socket\Connector, (a specific connector instance to use for both the websocket and the HTTP client)
    'node.maxConnectAttempts' => int, (maximum attempts at (re)connecting to a node, defaults to 0 (unlimited))
)
```

numShards.name: numShards
numShards.short_desc: The amount of shards the bot has.

createNodes.name: createNodes
createNodes.short_desc: Creates nodes as part of a factory. This is useful to import node configurations from a file.

getIdealNode.name: getIdealNode
getIdealNode.short_desc: Get an ideal node for the region solely based on region. If there is no ideal node, this will return the first connected node in the list.
exceptions: Thrown when no nodes are available

autoConnect.name: autoConnect
autoConnect.short_desc: Automatically make the node connect if it is disconnected (idling).

getOption.name: getOption
getOption.short_desc: Get a specific option, or the default value.

autoDisconnect.name: autoDisconnect
autoDisconnect.short_desc: Whether we automatically disconnect from the node.

start.name: start
start.short_desc: Starts all connections to the nodes.

stop.name: stop
stop.short_desc: Stops all connections to the nodes.

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\ClientEvents.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\ClientEvents
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\ClientEvents.short_desc: This interface documents all events emitted on the client. Events emitted on the nodes (and added to the client) are re-emitted on the client (as such documented here).
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\ClientEvents.long_desc: Player events are however **not** emitted on the client.

disconnect.name: disconnect
disconnect.short_desc: Emitted when the node gets disconnected.

error.name: error
error.short_desc: Emitted when an error happens. You should always listen on this event.

failover.name: failover
failover.short_desc: Emitted when a failover happens. Only emitted on the client.

stats.name: stats
stats.short_desc: Emitted when the node gets stats from the lavalink node.

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Link.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\Link
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Link.short_desc: A link connects to the lavalink node and listens for events and sends packets.

property: The node this link is for.

node.name: node
node.short_desc: The node this link is for.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: Needed to get User ID, Num Shards and the event loop.

node.name: node
node.short_desc: The node this link is for.

disconnect.name: disconnect
disconnect.short_desc: Closes the connection to the node websocket.

STATUS_IDLE.name: STATUS_IDLE
STATUS_IDLE.short_desc: WS connection status: Idling (disconnected and no reconnect planned).

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\LoadBalancer.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\LoadBalancer
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\LoadBalancer.short_desc: A load balacer chooses the node based on the node's stats.

getIdealNode.name: getIdealNode
getIdealNode.short_desc: Get an ideal node for the region. If there is no ideal node, this will return the first node in the list.
exceptions: Thrown when no nodes are available

autoConnect.name: autoConnect
autoConnect.short_desc: Automatically make the node connect if it is disconnected (idling).

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Node.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\Node
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Node.short_desc: This class represents a node. Each node connects to the representing lavalink node.

property: All players of the node, mapped by guild ID.
The websocket connection to the lavalink node.
The lavalink node's stats, or null.

link.name: link
link.short_desc: The websocket connection to the lavalink node.

players.name: players
players.short_desc: All players of the node, mapped by guild ID.

stats.name: stats
stats.short_desc: The lavalink node's stats, or null.

httpHost.name: httpHost
httpHost.short_desc: The complete URI to the node's HTTP API.

wsHost.name: wsHost
wsHost.short_desc: The complete URI to the node's Websocket server.

region.name: region
region.short_desc: A region identifier. Used to decide which is the best node to switch to when a node fails.

resolveTrack.name: resolveTrack
resolveTrack.short_desc: Resolves a track using Lavalink's REST API. Resolves with an instance of AudioTrack, an instance of AudioPlaylist or a Collection of AudioTrack instances (for search results), mapped by the track identifier.
exceptions: The exception the promise gets rejected with, when there are no matches.
The exception the promise gets rejected with, when loading the track failed.

sendVoiceUpdate.name: sendVoiceUpdate
sendVoiceUpdate.short_desc: Send a voice update event to the node, creates a new player and adds it to the collection.

setClient.name: setClient
setClient.short_desc: Sets the client and creates a Link. Invoked in `Client::addNode`.

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Player.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\Player
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\Player.short_desc: Represents a player of a guild on a node.

property: The node this player is on.
The guild ID this player is serving.
Whether the track is currently paused.
The position of the track in milliseconds.
The volume of the player from 0 to 100.

guildID.name: guildID
guildID.short_desc: The guild ID this player is serving.

node.name: node
node.short_desc: The node this player is on.

paused.name: paused
paused.short_desc: Whether the track is currently paused.

position.name: position
position.short_desc: The position of the track in milliseconds.

volume.name: volume
volume.short_desc: The volume of the player from 0 to 100.

getLastPosition.name: getLastPosition
getLastPosition.short_desc: Gets the last position of the played track in milliseconds.

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.short_desc: The start time in milliseconds to seek to.

endTime.name: endTime
endTime.short_desc: The end time when to stop playing in milliseconds.

setPaused.name: setPaused
setPaused.short_desc: Sets the paused state of the track.

setVolume.name: setVolume
setVolume.short_desc: Sets the volume of the player.

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\PlayerEvents.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\PlayerEvents
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\PlayerEvents.short_desc: This interface documents all events emitted on the player.

stuck.name: stuck
stuck.short_desc: Emitted when the track gets stuck.

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\RemoteStats.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\RemoteStats
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\RemoteStats.short_desc: Represents a node's stats. The lavalink node sends every minute stats, which updates any existing instances.

property: The node these stats are for.
How many players the node is running.
How many players are currently playing.
The uptime of the node in seconds.

node.name: node
node.short_desc: The node these stats are for.

players.name: players
players.short_desc: How many players the node is running.

playingPlayers.name: playingPlayers
playingPlayers.short_desc: How many players are currently playing.

uptime.name: uptime
uptime.short_desc: The uptime of the node in seconds.

CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\YasminClient.name: CharlotteDunois\Luna\YasminClient
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\YasminClient.short_desc: The Lavalink client for Yasmin. This class interacts with Yasmin to do all the updates for you.
CharlotteDunois\\Luna\\YasminClient.long_desc: If you get disconnected from the Discord Gateway, then all players will be destroyed (which is a consequence of the disconnect).

property: The open connections, mapped by guild ID (as int) to players.

connections.name: connections
connections.short_desc: The open connections, mapped by guild ID (as int) to players.

numShards.name: numShards
numShards.short_desc: The amount of shards the bot has.

joinChannel.name: joinChannel
joinChannel.short_desc: Joins a voice channel. The guild region will be stripped down to `eu`, `us`, etc. Resolves with an instance of Player.
exceptions: Thrown when the client is not ready.
Thrown when we have insufficient permissions.

node.name: node
node.short_desc: The node to use, or automatically determine one.

leaveChannel.name: leaveChannel
leaveChannel.short_desc: Leaves a voice channel and destroys any existing player.
exceptions: Thrown when the client is not ready.

moveToChannel.name: moveToChannel
moveToChannel.short_desc: Moves to a different voice channel in the same guild.
exceptions: Thrown when the client is not ready.
Thrown when there is connection for the guild.
Thrown when we have insufficient permissions.

start.name: start
start.short_desc: Starts all connections to the nodes. Can only be called **after** Yasmin turned ready.
